msbt.message: This thing's like a monument to how cool it is to learn about languages. I just wish I knew what it saidFor all I know, it could be a recipe for Did they have back then?
Hey, check it out, .<10_4 /> Totally looks like me, doesn't it?
Just wait. Any second now, he'll come alive and step off the pedestal. Aaaaaaaany second,
I don't get it. Why's everyone always making such a big deal about this one, ?She's got a sly smile. So what! I can do that. See?
Wow! There is a lot of art happening in this art. I mean, look at all that art. It's justso much art, .
I used to be in a band where we'd dress up kinda like this, mustaches and ruffles and all, .I think we spent more time picking out wild clothes than practicing our songs. We were so bad. Bwa ha ha!
I read about this one. So that's supposed to be the artist on the left, ?Which meanshe's painting me? Right now? But this was made back in OK, hang on, I'm confused.
I don't even know where to start with this. It's so intense, !
That's so sad. I just wish there was something I could do for her. I wanna give her a hug, or some tea
Hey, lookâ€”it's the Deserted Island Getaway Package of yesteryear! Bwa ha ha!
I got too close, and now all I can see are a whole bunch of dots no matter how far I back up, .
I feel like if I stare too much longer at this, those swirls in the sky are gonna drag me in,
I think I've been staring at this one too long. I'm kinda startin' to feel seasick,
So they made thousands of these? Did they think the emperor was, like, lonely or something, ?
I didn't like this one at first, but now it's kinda growin' on me. It's like a neat little garden gnome.
Hmmmmm I wonder what the artist was thinkin' when they made this, . Hmmmmmmm
Yo, ! Did I hear right? You really donated this? 'Cause that's pretty rad.Thanks to you, 's gettin' CLASSY, !
